author: Reggie Young
title: Student Athlete of the Week
text:
Previous Next 
WEST SALEM, Ohio - Senior Brevin Shearer of Northwestern High is the captain of the soccer team and one of the top defenders for the Huskies. 
His hard work on defense is what the coaches order. 
"Quietly leads by example. He's outspoken when he needs to be, he's the glue of the defense is how I consider him," assistant coach Mike Garver told newsnet5.com. 
Brevin has a strong passion for soccer and when he's not defending on the soccer field he is a youth referee. His passion for his academics is just as strong with a 4.0 GPA and a member of National Honor Society. 
"I want to do the best that I can in high school to prepare myself for college," Brevin said. "I'm trying to go into med school to become a PA and I need the best grades as possible to get scholarships and get through college as quickly as possible." 
---
